definition: dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: Fish sauce taste salty, very delicious, with a little bit of fish odor slightly.
sentences.chinese: 鱼露味咸，极鲜美，稍带一点鱼虾的腥味。

sentences.english: Pour in lime juice and fish sauce for seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 倒入青柠汁及鱼露调味。

sentences.english: But untreated fish sauce have no mutagenic effect.
sentences.chinese: 而未经亚硝化的鱼露无致突变性。

sentences.english: Add 1 tsp of fish sauce for umami or fifth-taste effect.
sentences.chinese: 加入1茶匙鱼露来提升鲜味的效果。

sentences.english: Using channel catfish as material, a fish sauce was developed with multi-enzymatic method.
sentences.chinese: 以斑点叉尾𫚔为原料，采用多酶法制取鱼露。

sentences.english: There are baby shrimp mixed in, and only the finest fish sauce is used as a seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 会混一点虾米，而且会加上最高级的鱼露来调味。

sentences.english: Season with fish sauce. Add the shredded Kaffir lime leaves.
sentences.chinese: 用鱼露调味，放入青柠檬叶。

definition: soy sauce (chiefly in Cantonese and Hakka areas)
to improve taste/to make sth palatable
